programs.name: FHA Loan
benefits: Accepts credit scores as low as 580
programs.description: Government-backed loan insured by the Federal Housing Administration, designed to help first-time and low-to-moderate income buyers.

programs.name: VA Loan
programs.description: Guaranteed by the Department of Veterans Affairs for active-duty service members, veterans, and eligible spouses.

programs.name: Conventional 97
programs.description: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac program allowing down payments as low as 3% for qualified borrowers.

programs.name: USDA Loan
benefits: Can include closing costs in loan
programs.description: USDA Rural Development loan for properties in eligible rural and suburban areas with income limits.

programs.name: Conventional Loan
programs.description: Standard loan not backed by government, typically requiring higher credit scores and larger down payments.
